episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the world's largest bottle of wine, Michelangelo's clever trick to appease a critic of his David sculpture, a bizarre multi-winged plane, and a humorous legal case involving a sperm bank and a man named Dick Weiner.

facts.fact: When the world's largest bottle of wine sprung a leak this year, the owner called the local fire department who stopped the spillage with sandbags.

When Michelangelo sculpted David, the town mayor told him that the nose was too big, so Michelangelo picked up some dust, climbed to the top of the statue, sprinkled the dust down, and claimed they had fixed it.
A plane was once built, which had nine wings.
This year a sperm bank lost a court case to a man named Dick Weiner.
